KLOC Construction is a residential and commercial construction company located in Toronto, Ontario, that takes great pride in our work.
 
We provide our clients with terrific value: excellent, high-quality work at a reasonable price coupled with outstanding customer service. KLOC Construction is also a Construction Management company specializing in small to medium size commercial projects and office fit-outs. 

We offer very competitive pricing and exemplary workmanship! We have built custom homes, townhouses, single family homes, condominiums, and apartments. We have completed a few projects for Alair homes last year.  Our contract services include design, build, materials and labor.

Our variety of talent and experience has delivered great renovations in GTA area over the past years. Our belief is to make it truly custom so it's perfect for you. Our mission is to build it the best way possible. From our talented designers to our skilled craftsmen and we dedicated to making a home that you'll love and an experience you'll treasure.
